Title: iQIYI
Manager: Goldman Sachs (Asia)/ Credit Suisse/ BofA Merrill Lynch
CO_managers: China Renaissance/ Citigroup/ UBS Investment Bank
Business: iQIYI is an innovative market-leading online entertainment service in China. We are at the forefront of the entertainment industry in China. Our corporate DNA combines creative talent with technology, fostering an environment for the continuous innovation and production of blockbuster content. Our platform features highly popular original content, as well as a comprehensive selection of professionally-produced and partner-generated content. Through our curated premium content, we attract a massive user base with tremendous user engagement, and generate significant monetization opportunities.We are one of the largest internet companies in China in terms of user base.
